page.content: {Q. If a centre was built for what {purpose would you expect to use it ? Sports 29% Being sociable 16% Entertainments 27% Don't know 6% Club Meetings 20% Would not use 2% {Q. What amenity do you feel the {village lacks ? More policemen 21% More things for young people 19% Better sports facilities 14% New or better pub 11% The village lacks nothing 8% Cafe/Coffee Bar/Restaurant 7% Banking facilities 6% Don't know 5% Others 3% The results suggest that most people want a Community Centre which they would use for a number of activities. They are very concerned about young people, vandalism and police cover. {Colin Michael Swinburne.
